install.name: Accordion FX
install.author: FlashXML.net
install.description: You can place this Accordion on any website for free without any Flash knowledge. The overall width and height can be customized up to 1680 x 1050 pixels. You may also have an unlimited number of images, advanced text effects, zoom image effects and auto play options. The tooltip is HTML/CSS formatted. Supports images (JPG, GIF, PNG, BMP), SWFs and also has external PNGs (changeable) for play-pause and next-previous buttons.

param.name: accordionfx_path
param.label: Path
param.description: Path of the Flash component and its assets

param.name: accordionfx_wmode
param.label: SWF wmode
param.description: Wmode parameter of the Flash component (optional)
